name: Rock-Paper-Scissors (Kaljal)
description: Rock, paper, scissors is an old game that almost everybody knows and with this simple game we can play it on virtual world. The game is simple, there are buttons on the bottom of our screen that we can choose our next move and after we choose our move our opponent makes its move, after selections showed up on our screen game tells which side is win that round by coloring the winning side of  progress bar on the top of the screen, when one side reaches second tile of the progress bar game is over and first one reached second tile is win the game.
